short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows the user search YouTube for a term by highlighting text and selecting 'Search YouTube for...' from the right click menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple extension that allows the user to search for a term in YouTube simply by selecting text, right clicking and selecting "Search YouTube for..." from the contextual menu. Easy to use. Nothing extra.
